Key Match Events: Colombia won 5-0 against Panama with goals from Cordoba (8'), Rodriguez (15' pen.), Diaz (41'), Rios (70'), and Borja (90+3' pen.)
Pre-Game Insights: Jefferson Lerma is ruled out for Colombia due to a one-match suspension, Mateus Uribe is likely to replace him
Jhon Lucumi is a doubt for Colombia due to an injury
Post-Match Reflections: Colombia manager Nestor Lorenzo will be pleased with the team's performance and the result
Colombia's players will be looking to build on this win as they progress in the tournament
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the University of Phoenix Stadium
Colombia's victory means they will move on to the next round of the Copa America
